Key Match Events: Afghanistan lost to Pakistan by one wicket in the last over thriller. Naseem Shah struck two match-winning sixes to shatter the hopes of Afghanistan.
Post-Match Reflections: Afghan captain Mohammad Nabi on Friday revealed that players in his team took tranquilisers following their loss against Pakistan in the T20 Asia Cup 2022's Super Four stage match held on September 7 in Sharjah.
Others: The article discusses the aftermath of Afghanistan's loss to Pakistan in the Asia Cup 2022, with a focus on the players taking tranquilizers to cope with their distress.
